fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance readability and hierarchy while maintaining a professional tone.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen font families are highly readable on screens of various sizes, ensuring comfortable reading experiences.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Headings are bold and clear, guiding the reader through the content. Body text is in a contrasting serif font for easy reading.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial and Georgia complement each other well, providing a harmonious balance between modernity and tradition.
